Redmi K30 5G with Lineage OS

  1. Follow https://www.getdroidtips.com/unlock-bootloader-any-xiaomi-devices/. Note that you have to bind your phone number.

  2. Reboot to bootloader (press the volume down and the power button).

  3. Place the needed files.

  4. fastboot flash vbmeta vbmeta.img

  5. fastboot flash recovery recovery.img

  6. Reboot to recovery (press the volume up and the power button). Install package from ADB. Do not Mount /system

  7. adb sideload lineage-17.1-20200419-UNOFFICIAL-picasso.zip.

  8. Reboot to recovery and adb sideload Magisk-v20.4.zip.

  9. You got a working Lineage OS system. Maybe the system will prompt you to wipe data.

References

  1. https://forum.xda-developers.com/redmi-k30-5g/development/recovery-lineageos-recovery-17-1-redmi-t4059879

  2. https://forum.xda-developers.com/redmi-k30-5g/development/rom-lineageos-17-1-redmi-k30-5g-picasso-t4063507

  3. https://www.getdroidtips.com/lineage-os-17-1-redmi-k30-5g/

  3. Lineage OS system: https://mega.nz/file/LAJjCYDT#L1Rd-WFJQ7SaU3vfAxU2y7AJsfH9qZ3fSAKMTQhgPWM.

Ye shall know them by their fruits. Do men gather grapes of thorns, or figs of thistles?

Even so every good tree bringeth forth good fruit; but a corrupt tree bringeth forth evil fruit.

A good tree cannot bring forth evil fruit, neither can a corrupt tree bring forth good fruit.

And then will I profess unto them, I never knew you: depart from me, ye that work iniquity.
